SC/APPEAL/61/2023: (3) For the purposes of this section “evidence in support of an alibi”
means evidence tending to show that by reason of the presence of

column1: the  defendant  at  a  particular  place  or

SC/APPEAL/61/2023: particular  time  he  was  not,  or  was  not  likely  to  have  been,  at  the
place where the offence is alleged to have been committed at the time
